knimeNode.name: Inductive Miner 2
knimeNode.shortDescription: use the inductive miner to do process discovery

fullDescription.intro:
Accept the Event Log to generate a process tree. Process tree is a block-structured process model, where the (inner) nodes are operators such as sequence, and choice, while leaves are activities. With process tree, it guarantees the soundness of process model.
This node output process tree as output. Later, the process tree can be converted into Petri net.
fullDescription.option: The classifier chosen to classify the event log.
TO choose which Inductive Miner methods is used
If we choose one method with noise filter, this options shows up and to set the noise filter threshold.
